snippet.title: Wii U - Mario Kart 8 DLC Pack 1 Trailer
snippet.description:
You can advance purchase Pack 1, Pack 2, or the Pack 1 + Pack 2 Bundle either through the Shop section in Mario Kart 8  or in Nintendo eShop. Those who advance purchase both packs can begin using eight new Yoshi and Shy Guy colors immediately!

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun! https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Visit Nintendo.com for all the latest! http://www.nintendo.com
